alt-labels.description: Places the labels beneath the step.

bg-color.description: Applies specified color to the control’s background. Used on components that also support the color prop. - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
bg-color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件的背景。用于也支持 color 属性的组件。- 支持实用工具颜色（例如 Success 或 Purple）或 CSS 颜色（#033 或 RGBA（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

border.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be xs, sm, md, lg, xl.
border.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 xs、sm、md、lg、xl。

color.description: Applies specified color to the control - supports utility colors (for example success or purple) or css color (#033 or rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.5)). Find a list of built-in classes on the colors page.
color.description_zh: 将指定的颜色应用于控件 - 支持实用工具颜色（例如 success 或紫色）或 css 颜色（#033 或 rgba（255， 0， 0， 0.5））。在 colors 页面上查找内置类的列表。

complete-icon.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

disabled.description: Puts all children components into a disabled state.
disabled.description_zh: 将所有子组件置于禁用状态。

edit-icon.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

elevation.description: Designates an elevation applied to the component between 0 and 24. You can find more information on the elevation page.
elevation.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 0 到 24 之间的高程。您可以在海拔页面上找到更多信息。

error-icon.description_zh: 缺少描述（在 github 中编辑）

height.description: Sets the height for the component.

hide-actions.description: Hide actions bar (prev and next buttons).
hide-actions.description_zh: 隐藏操作栏（“上一个”和“下一个”按钮）。

:items.description: An array of strings or objects used for automatically generating children components.
:items.description_zh: 用于自动生成子组件的字符串或对象的数组。

item-title.description: Property on supplied items that contains its title.
item-title.description_zh: 包含其标题的所提供项上的属性。

item-value.description: Property on supplied items that contains its value.
item-value.description_zh: 包含其值的 supplied items 上的属性。

location.description: Specifies the component’s location. Can combine by using a space separated string.
location.description_zh: 指定组件的位置。可以使用空格分隔的字符串进行组合。

mandatory.description: Forces at least one item to always be selected (if available).
mandatory.description_zh: 强制始终选择至少一个项目（如果可用）。

:max.description: Sets a maximum number of selections that can be made.
:max.description_zh: 设置可以进行的最大选择数。

max-height.description: Sets the maximum height for the component.

max-width.description: Sets the maximum width for the component.

min-height.description: Sets the minimum height for the component.

min-width.description: Sets the minimum width for the component.

mobile.description: Forces the stepper into a mobile state, removing labels from stepper items.
mobile.description_zh: 强制步进器进入移动状态，从步进器项中删除标签。

mobile-breakpoint.type: number / xs / sm / md / lg / xl / xxl
mobile-breakpoint.description: Overrides the display configuration default screen size that the component should be considered in mobile.
mobile-breakpoint.description_zh: 覆盖组件在移动设备中应考虑的显示配置默认屏幕大小。

v-model.description: The v-model value of the component. If component supports the multiple prop, this defaults to an empty array.
v-model.description_zh: 组件的 v-model 值。如果 component 支持 multiple prop，则默认为空数组。

multiple.description: Allows one to select multiple items.

next-text.description: The text used for the Next button.
next-text.description_zh: 用于 Next （下一步） 按钮的文本。

non-linear.description: Allow user to jump to any step.
non-linear.description_zh: 允许用户跳转到任何步骤。

position.description: Sets the position for the component.

prev-text.description: The text used for the Prev button.
prev-text.description_zh: 用于 Prev 按钮的文本。

rounded.description: Designates the border-radius applied to the component. This can be 0, xs, sm, true, lg, xl, pill, circle, and shaped. Find more information on available border radius classes on the Border Radius page.
rounded.description_zh: 指定应用于组件的 border-radius。这可以是 0、xs、sm、true、lg、xl、pill、circle 和 shaped。在 Border Radius 页面上查找有关可用边界半径类的更多信息。

selected-class.description: Configure the active CSS class applied when an item is selected.
selected-class.description_zh: 配置在选择项目时应用的活动 CSS 类。

tag.description: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
tag.description_zh: 指定根元素上使用的自定义标记。

theme.description: Specify a theme for this component and all of its children.
theme.description_zh: 为此组件及其所有子组件指定主题。

tile.description: Removes any applied border-radius from the component.
tile.description_zh: 从组件中删除任何应用的 border-radius。

width.description: Sets the width for the component.

events.name: update:modelValue
events.description: Event that is emitted when the component’s model changes.
events.description_zh: 组件的模型更改时发出的事件。

slots.name: [`header-item.${string}`]
slots.description: Slot for customizing header items when using the items prop.
slots.description_zh: 使用 items 属性时用于自定义标题项的插槽。
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: [`item.${string}`]
slots.description: Slot for customizing the content for each step.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义每个步骤内容的插槽。

slots.name: actions
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义 v-stepper-actions 的插槽。

slots.name: header
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义标头的插槽。

slots.name: header-item
slots.description: Slot for customizing all header items.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义所有标题项的插槽。
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: icon
slots.description: Slot for customizing all stepper item icons.
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义所有步进项图标的插槽。
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: next
slots.description: Slot for customizing the next step functionailty
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义下一步功能的插槽

slots.name: prev
slots.description: Slot for customizing the prev step functionality
slots.description_zh: 用于自定义上一个步骤功能的插槽

slots.name: subtitle
slots.description: Slot for the component’s subtitle content.
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}

slots.name: title
slots.description: Slot for the component’s title content.
slots.params:
{
  canEdit: boolean
  hasError: boolean
  hasCompleted: boolean
  title: string | number
  subtitle: string | number
  step: any
}
